name: Desert Golem
description:
Desert Golem is a twist on the classic wave survival type game. The golem will move around randomly and the player's job is to keep the golem safe by blocking off enemies and redirecting the golem.

here's my submission to the Wowie game jam. unfortunately I am not happy with the final product thought for my first jam I think I did ok. (There may be some bugs)

Controls

left clicking will drop a box

right clicking will delete a box
